# The attempt to harvest iron ore has failed once again, indicating that I am unable to collect resources from the iron ore patch directly.
# 
# This repeated issue suggests that there may be a problem with the harvesting mechanics or the specific location of the iron ore patch. 
# 
# To move forward, I should focus on crafting the necessary components using the resources I have available. Since I have successfully crafted a stone furnace, I can now use it to smelt iron ore into iron plates once I manage to gather some iron ore.

# Given the current situation, I will take a different approach. I will check my inventory to see if there are any other resources I can utilize or if I can craft anything else that might help me progress.

# Let's inspect the inventory to see what I currently have available.
inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Inspecting the inventory to check available resources.
